Package org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit

This package contains Check Digit validation/calculation routines.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CheckDigit Check Digit calculation and validation.
 

Class Summary
ABANumberCheckDigit Modulus 10 ABA Number (or Routing Transit Number (RTN)) Check Digit calculation/validation.
CUSIPCheckDigit Modulus 10 CUSIP (North American Securities) Check Digit calculation/validation.
EAN13CheckDigit Modulus 10 EAN-13 / UPC / ISBN-13 Check Digit calculation/validation.
IBANCheckDigit IBAN (International Bank Account Number) Check Digit calculation/validation.
ISBN10CheckDigit Modulus 11 ISBN-10 Check Digit calculation/validation.
ISBNCheckDigit Combined ISBN-10 / ISBN-13 Check Digit calculation/validation.
ISINCheckDigit Modulus 10 ISIN (International Securities Identifying Number) Check Digit calculation/validation.
LuhnCheckDigit Modulus 10 Luhn Check Digit calculation/validation.
ModulusCheckDigit Abstract Modulus Check digit calculation/validation.
SedolCheckDigit Modulus 10 SEDOL (UK Securities) Check Digit calculation/validation.
VerhoeffCheckDigit Verhoeff (Dihedral) Check Digit calculation/validation.
 

Exception Summary
CheckDigitException Check Digit calculation/validation error.
 

Package org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit Description

This package contains Check Digit validation/calculation routines.
